text: "No Regrets" is a 1968 song by folk singer/songwriter Tom Rush and is the final track from his 1968 album The Circle Game. It went to number 57 in the United Kingdom and was covered by The Walker Brothers in 1975. ==The Walker Brothers version== In 1975, American group The Walker Brothers covered the song as the title track to their fourth studio album No Regrets. It was a comeback for the band following their 1967 split. It went to number 7 in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands, number 5 in Ireland and number 28 in Australia and was covered again in 1982 by Midge Ure. ===Track listing=== ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:The Walker Brothers songs
title: No Regrets (Tom Rush song)
